{{Wired embedded system |brand=CherryPi |model=F1C200S |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Shenzhen LC Technology |price=18 |est_release_date=02/2022 |type=development board, single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB (Type C) Female |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=F1C200s |cpu1_cspeed=408 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD5F1GQ4UAYIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Allwinner |ram1_model=F1C200s |expansion_if_types=USB Type C |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, console port,, USB Female (Type-C),, (115200 8N1) |eth_none=true |addl_chips=USB to Serial Interface;WCH;CH340E;;1;,,, 4-Wire Touch Screen Controller w/ I2C IF;ShenZhen Nsiway;NS2009;;1;,,, Filterless Class-D Mono Audio Amplifier;Diodes Inc;PAM8301;;1;,,, 3 Channel Power Management IC;Everanalog;EA3036C;;1;,,, 100mA Low Dropout CMOS Voltage Regulator;Torex;XC6206;;2;,,, White LED Step-Up Converter;PowTech;PT4103;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, MIPI CSI, RGB LCD FPC, microphone, UART, SPI, I2C, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2020.07; |stock_os=Linux;5.4.73;BuildRoot |default_user=root }} {{TagLine|F1C200S Development Board}} :[http://www.chinalctech.com/cpzx/503.html Product page]
"CherryPi-F1C200S" and "www.lctech-inc.com" are silkscreened on the board top. :later versions may have "Lctech Pi F1c200s" and the url.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/02/03/more-allwinner-f1c200s-arm9-boards-mangopi-r3-and-cherrypi-f1c200s/ ''More Allwinner F1C200s ARM9 boards: MangoPi R3 and CherryPi-F1C200S'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Lctech_Pi_F1C200s ''Lctech Pi F1C200s'' on '''Linux-SunXi''' wiki]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] F1C200s @420MHz (ARM926EJS) *Memory: 64MB (DDR SIP) RAM *Storage: 128MB (SPI NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *USB: 1x Type-C USB (OTG) port *Power: 5V via Type-C USB port
===See also=== *[[CherryPi PC V3S]] *[[CherryPi PC V7]]
==Images== <gallery> File:CherryPi-F1C200S Top.jpeg|Board Top File:CherryPi-F1C200S Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
